inventory.name: pacific halibut
inventory.description: Everyones favorite white fish. We will cut it to the size you need and ship it.

inventory.name: lobster
inventory.description: These tender, mouth-watering beauties are a fantastic hit at any dinner party.

inventory.name: sea scallops
inventory.description: Big, sweet and tender. True dry-pack scallops from the icey waters of Alaska. About 8-10 per pound

inventory.name: mahi mahi

inventory.name: King Crab
inventory.description: Crack these open and enjoy them plain or with one of our cocktail sauces.
